advantages.item1_text: Free delivery anywhere in the city — at any time.
advantages.item2_text: Honest pricing with zero surprises. Transparent terms.
advantages.item3_text: Hire with a professional driver — convenient and safe.

editor_block.title: Car rental in Ukraine with REIZ: a new approach to comfort
editor_block.text:
REIZ is a car rental service in Lviv with attention to details and transparent conditions.
We deliver cars around the city and can transport the vehicle to any point in Ukraine upon request.
Daily rate
The daily rate is the best way to “try on” a car without commitments.
In one day you’ll find out how the selected model behaves on Lviv’s road surface and highway, whether parking is convenient, if there’s enough space for suitcases or sports gear, and if you like the sound, seating and driver aids.
One day is usually enough to decide: extend the rental for a week/month or change class.
Many clients rent a car for a day to test it before a weekend in the Carpathians — the climbs to Slavske or Bukovel, the hairpins and long descents quickly show if this is the right car for your holiday.
Weekly rental in Lviv
Weekly car rental in Lviv is the best balance of price and freedom: one fixed rate for seven days and your own pace without taxi waits and transfers.
In a week it’s easy to combine city and excursions: Lviv region castles, wine roads and, of course, a trip to the Carpathians — Slavske, Skole, Bukovel.
The “week” format gives more time to test the route and the car than the daily rental, and you can simply extend the term if needed.
Monthly rental
Monthly rental — for those who stay longer: project, business trip, relocation.
Lower daily cost, a single predictable payment and full freedom of routes — without schedules or city ties.
The “30 days” format is created for regular business trips and intercity routes: Lviv ↔ Kyiv for meetings and negotiations, visits to clients in Ternopil, Ivano-Frankivsk, Rivne.
One car covers all your tasks for the month: office, meetings, moves, welcoming partners and guests.
If necessary you can easily extend the term or change the model class.
Long-term rental in Lviv
Long-term rental — a solution for those staying longer: city residents, relocation, projects lasting several months, corporate tasks.
For a term from 3 to 12+ months you get a personal vehicle with a fixed monthly payment and a predictable budget — no hassle with buying, selling and loss of value.
It’s convenient and economical: the car is always at hand for daily tasks and intercity trips — office, meetings, branches, regular routes Lviv ↔ Kyiv and around the region.
The format allows planning your workload a month ahead, and when tasks change — you can easily extend the term or replace the model with a more suitable one (city sedan, estate, crossover).
On request we organise delivery and return in other Ukrainian cities.
Budget cars rental — from $20/day
Budget car rental — from $20/day
Need a practical car without overpaying? REIZ economy-class is comfort in the city and on the road at a reasonable budget.
Compact size for city parking, confident handling, low fuel consumption and enough space for 1–4 passengers and luggage.
Our advantages of car rental in Lviv
  • User-friendly website — fast filter, up-to-date prices and accurate specifications.
  • Instant processing — booking in a couple of minutes.
  • Delivery where convenient — airport LWO, train station, city centre or delivery to address.
  • Transparent price — the final cost is visible before payment, no hidden fees.
  • Flexible terms — day, week, month or long-term; easily extend or change the model.
  • Reliable fleet — regular service, clean interior, seasonal tyres on time.
  • 24/7 support — we respond quickly to any inquiries (UA/RU/EN/HE-IL).
  • Intercity on request — delivery and return anywhere in Ukraine.
  • Catalogue compliance — you receive exactly the class and equipment you selected.
  • Simple rules — fuel, mileage and return described in plain language in the agreement.
No deposit / reduced deposit
You can rent a car without a deposit — this makes the rental more affordable and budget-predictable.
For certain models there is an option to reduce the deposit by 50%.
Availability depends on model, term and rental dates; all details are visible at booking.
Driver services in Lviv
Want comfort without the wheel? Order a car with a professional driver — we will deliver it to airport LWO, to the hotel or the station.
Free car delivery in Lviv
Free within Lviv. We deliver the vehicle within the city — centre, districts, airport LWO and railway station — at no extra cost (airport parking paid by client).
Outside the city — paid. Delivery to region and across Ukraine is possible. Cost depends on address and mileage — confirmed by administrator before booking.
Return. Within Lviv — no extra fee; outside the city — under the same conditions as delivery.
How to arrange. During booking select “delivery to address” and specify location/time. Administrator will confirm details and, when leaving Lviv, quote the cost.
Additional services
  • Navigation — all cars equipped with Apple CarPlay and Android Auto. Connect your smartphone and use your familiar maps.
  • Child seat. Provided on request (age groups based on need).
  • Exit abroad. Possible after prior agreement — we arrange necessary documents and additional insurance.
  • Unlimited mileage. The Unlimited option is available for some models/rates; availability and cost visible at booking or confirm with administrator.
Select the needed options when booking — we will prepare the vehicle for the time of delivery.
Vehicles in excellent condition
We carefully maintain the REIZ fleet — so each trip in Lviv is comfortable and safe.
Before delivery every car undergoes a checklist: brakes, lights, tyres and pressure, fluids, washer. Seasonal tyres are installed on time.
Cleanliness and order: dry/wet cleaning of interior, wiping surfaces, washing body; if necessary — deep cleaning.
Maintenance per schedule: planned service at partner service centres, replacement of consumables without delay.
You receive a pristine, functioning and ready-to-go car — just sit in and drive.
Basic safe driving tips
You’ve booked a car — next everything depends on your route. To ensure the trip is calm and pleasant, keep in mind these basic safety rules.
Keep a safe distance
Keep a gap to the vehicle ahead — it’s your time to react.
The basic rule is “three seconds”. Choose a marker (a sign, pole): when the vehicle ahead passes it, count “one-two-three”. If you have crossed the marker earlier — your distance is too small.
Change lanes only when it’s safe
  • Assess the situation: centre and side mirrors, then a quick shoulder check — verify the “blind spot”.
  • Give a signal early, not at the moment of manoeuvre — allow others time to react.
  • Synchronise your speed with the flow in the target lane, don’t “dive in” with a large speed gap.
  • Maintain distance: don’t cut in — leave a safe interval ahead and behind.
  • One manoeuvre — one lane: no “zigzag” or crossing multiple lanes at once.
  • Avoid lane-changes at intersections, pedestrian crossings and in turns.
  • Special attention to motorcycles/bicycles/scooters — they easily get lost in mirrors.
  • In bad weather act more gently: larger interval and more time to manoeuvre.
  • Finished — turn off the indicator and restore a safe distance.
Observe road signs
Signs and signals are the “language” of the road: they warn you ahead of restrictions and possible hazards.
Read them in time and act without haste.
If a sign or traffic scheme is unclear — reduce speed, keep distance and follow the right-of-way rules.
Alcohol-free driving
Driving a vehicle under the influence of alcohol is strictly prohibited.
REIZ adheres to a zero-tolerance policy: the client must abstain from alcohol before the trip and throughout the use of the rented vehicle.

faq.group1_item1_answer: Lviv has many paid zones and municipal parking lots. Always park within marked lines or in guarded parking areas, check road signs and parking meters, and keep receipts. Improper parking results in fines paid by the renter. In areas with limited parking, use shopping mall or hotel parking. It is useful to install city apps for parking payment and zone navigation. Before leaving the car overnight, check local courtyard/street rules to avoid towing.
faq.group1_item1_question: Where to park a rental car in Lviv and how to avoid fines?
faq.group1_item2_answer: We provide delivery/return to any address in Lviv and meet you at the LWO terminal at the agreed time. Extra charges may apply for early/late hours and waiting time, final price depends on distance. Intercity delivery across Ukraine is also available on request. To ensure timely service, book in advance and provide your flight/hotel details. Want to speed up the process? Book online at REIZ Rental Cars — it’s more convenient and locks in your rate.
faq.group1_item2_question: Car delivery to an address and Lviv Airport (LWO): conditions and prices
faq.group1_item3_answer: A daily mileage limit applies (usually 250–300 km/day), which is enough for business and tourist routes around Lviv and the region. For longer trips (e.g., Lviv–Kyiv or Lviv–Odesa), add the extended or unlimited mileage option when booking. Exceeding the limit is charged at a fixed rate per kilometer according to tariffs. Inform us about your route in advance — we’ll suggest the best option and where to refuel along the way.
faq.group1_item3_question: Is there a mileage limit and how to book a trip across Ukraine without restrictions?
faq.group2_item1_answer: Rental includes mandatory liability insurance and standard Casco with a deductible. Liability covers third-party damages, Casco covers damage to the rental car above the deductible. Certain cases (e.g., glass/tires) may have special conditions — clarify during booking in the “Insurance” section. In case of an accident, record the incident and call the authorities immediately. Extended coverage reduces your risks and helps close cases faster.
faq.group2_item1_question: What does insurance cover and how does it help on the road? (Liability/Casco)
faq.group2_item2_answer: The deductible is the maximum amount you pay in case of damage; insurance covers the rest. The deposit is the amount blocked on your card during the rental, usually equal to the deductible. Example: damage = 50,000 UAH, deductible/deposit = 20,000 UAH — your responsibility is 20,000 UAH, the rest is covered by insurance. The deposit is released after returning the car undamaged; release time depends on the bank and usually takes a few days.
faq.group2_item2_question: Deductible vs. deposit: what’s the difference and how much do you risk?
faq.group2_item3_answer:
Renting without a deposit is not possible.

By default, a deposit equal to the deductible is blocked (depends on car class). You may reduce your responsibility by choosing:

  • −50% deposit/deductible (CDW);
  • −100% deposit/“zero liability” (SCDW) for damage/theft.

Important: even with “zero liability” there is a mandatory hold of $200–300 (depending on model) for:

  • fines and tolls,
  • missing fuel,
  • car wash/interior cleaning,
  • lost keys.

This hold is not for damages and is refunded after clearing possible charges. Choose the right package when booking — we’ll suggest the best option for rentals in Lviv and trips across Ukraine.
faq.group2_item3_question: Can I rent without a deposit and how does “zero liability” work?
faq.group3_item1_answer: Basic requirements: from 21 years old with at least 2 years of driving experience. For business/premium cars: 23–25 years old and at least 5 years of experience. If you don’t fully meet the requirements, a “young driver” program is available for an extra fee. All drivers must be listed in the rental agreement: prepare documents and provide additional driver details in advance to avoid refusal at pickup.
faq.group3_item1_question: Minimum age and driving experience for renting in Lviv and Ukraine
faq.group3_item2_answer: Driving within Ukraine is unrestricted, but leaving the country is possible only with company’s written permission and a “Green Card” insurance. Time is needed for processing and checking the route/borders. Crossing borders without approval is prohibited, voids insurance, and leads to penalties. Planning a foreign trip? Inform us in advance — we’ll check requirements, prepare documents, and advise on timing.
faq.group3_item2_question: Can I drive outside Ukraine with a rental car?
faq.group3_item3_answer: Only drivers listed in the contract are allowed to drive the car. Passing the car to third parties, using it for taxi, carsharing, or courier services is prohibited and voids insurance. Need a second driver? Add them to the contract — it’s legal and safe. Violations result in contractual fines and full financial liability in case of an incident.
faq.group3_item3_question: Giving the car to third parties and using it for taxi/carsharing: what is prohibited
faq.group4_item1_answer: We accept payments in cash (UAH, USD, EUR), Visa/Mastercard cards, bank transfer, and — upon prior agreement — cryptocurrency (USDT/USDC). Currency/crypto payments follow the company’s rate at the time of transaction; bank and network fees may apply. Payments are available in Lviv and for delivery across Ukraine. The deposit is blocked on the renter’s card at pickup and released after returning the car undamaged. Release time depends on the bank (usually a few business days). For companies — invoices and closing documents are provided.
faq.group4_item1_question: What payment methods are available and how is the deposit taken?
faq.group4_item2_answer: Required: passport/ID card, driver’s license category B (at least 2 years), and a bank card in the renter’s name. Foreign citizens are advised to have an International Driving Permit (IDP) along with their national license — this makes verification easier. If planning a rental in Lviv during weekends or holidays, book in advance — document checks are faster and car selection is wider (see “Restrictions and Prohibitions”).
faq.group4_item2_question: What documents are required for renting in Lviv: locals and foreigners?
faq.group4_item3_answer: Cars are provided with a full tank and must be returned refueled to full. If not, missing fuel and a refueling service fee are charged at company rates. Refuel before return, keep the receipt — this avoids questions at handover. For those planning active trips around Lviv with early departures/late returns, plan your refueling and timing in advance.
faq.group4_item3_question: “Full-to-full” fuel policy: how to return a car without extra charges

faqPage.main_title: Frequently Asked Questions About Car Rental
faqPage.faq_pretitle: Find answers to frequently asked questions about car rental with REIZ.

questions.question: CAN I RENT A CAR OVERNIGHT?
questions.answer: Yes, nighttime pick-up and return are available 24/7. You can start or finish the rental late at night or early in the morning — please agree the exact time with a manager in advance. Night delivery/return may include an after-hours service fee.

questions.question: CAN I RENT A CAR FOR MORE THAN A MONTH?
questions.answer: Yes. Long-term rentals (30+ days) come with reduced rates and monthly payments. Scheduled maintenance is on us. Ask a manager for a tailored quote.

questions.question: WHAT IS THE MINIMUM AGE AND DRIVING EXPERIENCE?
questions.answer: Typically from 21 years old and 2+ years of driving. For crossovers and premium class, requirements are higher — from 25 years old. If you don’t meet age/experience, a Young Driver fee may apply.

questions.question: DO I HAVE TO REFUEL ON THE FIRST DAY?
questions.answer: We use a Full-to-Full policy: you receive the car with a full tank and return it full. If refueling before return isn’t possible, a prepaid fuel option is available.

questions.question: I HAD AN ACCIDENT — WHAT SHOULD I DO?
questions.answer: Ensure safety, call us 24/7 and the police (102), and do not leave the scene. Take photos/videos and, if applicable, complete the European accident statement. Your liability depends on the chosen coverage (CDW/SCDW). See the Insurance section for details.

questions.question: WHAT DOCUMENTS DO I NEED TO RENT A CAR?
questions.answer: Passport, valid driving licence, and a bank card. Foreign drivers may need an International Driving Permit (IDP) in addition to their national licence.

questions.question: HOW CAN I PAY FOR THE RENTAL?
questions.answer: By Visa/Mastercard (including Apple Pay/Google Pay) or cash. The deposit is pre-authorised on the card or taken in cash and released after all charges are closed.

questions.question: CAN I ADD AN ADDITIONAL DRIVER?
questions.answer: Yes, if their data is added to the contract and documents are provided. Age and driving-experience requirements are the same as for the main driver.

questions.question: IS SMOKING ALLOWED IN THE CAR?
questions.answer: No, smoking is prohibited. Violation incurs a fine and interior cleaning charge according to the rental terms.

questions.question: HOW IS THE SECURITY DEPOSIT TAKEN?
questions.answer: Typically via card pre-authorisation or cash by agreement. The amount depends on the car class and selected insurance coverage.

questions.question: CAN I PICK UP IN KYIV AND RETURN IN ANOTHER CITY?
questions.answer: Yes, one-way returns are available for an intercity transfer fee. Route and timing must be agreed in advance.

questions.question: IS THERE A MILEAGE LIMIT?
questions.answer: Daily rates usually include a mileage limit (e.g., 250–300 km/day). Excess mileage is charged per km. Increased or unlimited mileage options are available.

questions.question: DO YOU DELIVER TO ADDRESSES AND TO LVIV AIRPORT (LWO)?
questions.answer: Yes. We can deliver to your address in the city and meet you at the airport. Pricing depends on zone and time of day. Intercity delivery is available upon request.

questions.question: ARE CHILD SEATS/BOOSTERS AVAILABLE?
questions.answer: Yes, on prior request. Options are available for different age groups. A small extra fee may apply — check when booking.

questions.question: CAN I TRAVEL WITH PETS?
questions.answer: Yes, provided cleanliness is maintained (use a carrier or cover). Extra cleaning fees may apply for heavy soiling or odours.

questions.question: WHAT ARE THE CANCELLATION/RESCHEDULING RULES?
questions.answer: Free cancellation is available in advance within the stated window (usually 24–48 hours). Late cancellation or no-show may incur a fee. Date changes are possible subject to availability.

questions.question: IN WHAT CONDITION SHOULD I RETURN THE CAR?
questions.answer: As received: roadworthy, clean, and with a full tank. Heavy soiling may require paid washing/detailing. Please check you haven’t left personal items.

questions.question: HOW ARE FINES, TOLLS, AND PARKING CHARGES HANDLED?
questions.answer: Charges incurred during the rental are settled after the trip. If needed, they may be deducted from the deposit. Final settlement timing depends on data from authorities and the bank.

questions.question: DO I NEED AN INTERNATIONAL DRIVING PERMIT?
questions.answer: Foreign drivers may need an IDP in addition to their national licence (especially if it’s not in Latin script). Ukrainian residents need a national licence of the established format.

questions.question: WHAT CAR CLASSES ARE AVAILABLE AND WHAT ARE THE APPROXIMATE PRICES?
questions.answer: Economy, standard, crossovers, and premium are available. Price depends on class, rental duration, and season. The longer the rental, the lower the daily rate. Check current rates in the fleet or with a manager.

eligibility.title: ELIGIBILITY FOR EXTENDED COVERAGE
items: Drivers aged 25+ with at least 4 years of experience.
Rental period must be from 3 days and longer.
The person on the rental agreement must be the one driving.
In case of an accident, notify the company within one hour and call the police.

exclusions.title: NOT COVERED & PROHIBITED
items: Driving under the influence of alcohol or drugs.
Allowing an unauthorized driver. Third parties at the wheel.
Theft of external parts such as mirrors or wipers.
Leaving the scene of an accident.
Using the car for commercial purposes (taxi, sub-rental). Strictly prohibited.
Damage to the vehicle’s interior.

terms.title: TERMS OF USE
terms.driverRequirementsAge: Minimum driver age is 21 years, minimum driving experience is 2 years.
terms.driverRequirementsNote: For some vehicles, the minimum driver age is 24 years.
terms.text: After payment we'll email the certificate to you, or arrange courier delivery at a convenient time and place — simply enable «I want a physical certificate».

checkout.title: PAYMENT
checkout.description: After payment we'll email the certificate to you, or contact you to arrange delivery at a convenient time and place – simply enable «I want a physical certificate»

form.consent: By clicking «Proceed to payment», you accept the personal data processing terms.

items.q: Do I need to book a car in advance when using a certificate?
items.aHtml: Yes, we recommend booking a car in advance. The certificate confirms the amount or rental rights but does not automatically reserve a specific vehicle. Popular models may be unavailable, especially on weekends and holidays.

items.q: What if the desired car is unavailable on the requested dates?
items.aHtml: In that case, we will offer an alternative vehicle of a similar class or help you find other convenient dates. The certificate retains its value and can be used later.

items.q: Can I use the certificate in parts or only for one rental?
items.aHtml: The certificate can be used for one or several rentals depending on its value. If the rental cost is less than the certificate amount, the remaining balance is preserved and can be used later.

items.q: Can I exchange the certificate for cash?
items.aHtml: The certificate cannot be exchanged for cash. It can only be used for car rental within the available fleet.

items.q: Who can use the gift certificate?
items.aHtml: The certificate can be used by the person whose name it was issued to. If you want to transfer the certificate to another person, please contact us in advance — we will reissue the certificate and update the driver's name in the system. The certificate can be used by a driver who meets the age requirements and minimum driving experience specified in the rental terms.

meta.title: List your car for rent in Lviv
meta.description: List your car in Lviv with REIZ: official agreement, monthly payouts, maintenance and 24/7 monitoring. Check the requirements and submit a request.
meta.og_title: List your car for rent in Lviv
meta.og_description: Hand over your car to REIZ and earn passive income. Agreement, payouts, service and full control.

hero.title: List your car for rent in Lviv
hero.intro: Turn your car into a source of income without handling day-to-day operations. Our experienced team manages everything for you.

why.title: WHY IT’S BENEFICIAL
items: Invest in a growing car-rental market without extra hassle. We handle the full cycle — from listing to vehicle return.
Your car generates income — payouts are transferred to your account monthly according to the agreement.
Regular maintenance, inspections and monitoring — to keep your car earning without downtime or unexpected failures.
Full control: track the vehicle status via your personal account. All processes are transparent and automated.
Rentals are covered by an official agreement. All legal aspects and paperwork meet established standards.

requirements.title: VEHICLE REQUIREMENTS FOR LISTING
items: Vehicle no older than 3 years
Technically sound and fully serviced
Valid third-party liability insurance (CASCO comprehensive optional)
The car must be legally clean — no liens/restrictions and not reported stolen

form.title: SUBMIT A LISTING REQUEST
form.text: Fill out the form so we can estimate the potential yield of your vehicle and contact you to clarify the details.

meta.title: Car Rental Terms Lviv — Requirements & Documents

meta.og_title: Car Rental Terms Lviv — Requirements & Documents | REIZ
meta.og_description: Transparent car rental conditions in Lviv: age 21+, 2+ years experience ✓ No deposit ✓ Required documents list ✓ Free delivery

hero.title: Car Rental Terms
hero.subtitle: Transparent terms with no hidden fees — everything you need to know before booking

citizensUA.title: FOR CITIZENS OF UKRAINE
items: ID card
Tax ID number
Driver’s license

foreignCitizens.title: FOR FOREIGN CITIZENS
items: Valid entry stamp/permit for Ukraine
International Driving Permit (IDP)
Passport

paragraphs: All vehicles are covered by mandatory insurance. Additional protection packages (CDW/SCDW) are available and reduce the renter’s financial liability in case of damage or theft. Details are on the “Insurance” page.

When a deposit is provided by credit card, the card must be issued exclusively in the renter’s name. The deposit is pre-authorized on the credit card in accordance with the rental agreement. After the vehicle is returned and all obligations under the rental agreement have been duly fulfilled by the renter, the deposit shall be released by the lessor. The actual timeframe for the funds to be credited back is determined by the rules and internal procedures of the renter’s issuing bank and may take several banking days. The lessor shall not be held liable for any delays caused by the renter’s bank.

The rental price depends on the vehicle class, rental duration, and season. The longer the rental, the lower the daily rate. Check current prices in the vehicle listing or contact our manager for details.

A daily mileage limit of 300 km applies to each rental. If the установлен limit is exceeded, an additional charge applies according to the rates listed in the table below, depending on the vehicle category. If a higher daily limit or unlimited mileage is required, the renter may contact a manager for an individual cost calculation.
